description: cmd/api: update run.go to fetch from go.tools when needed

messages.text:
Hello gri@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

https://codereview.appspot.com/12639043/diff/8001/src/cmd/api/run.go
File src/cmd/api/run.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/12639043/diff/8001/src/cmd/api/run.go#newcode89
src/cmd/api/run.go:89: tmpDir := filepath.Join(cloneDir, "go.tools.TMP")
make "go.tools.TMP" a constant and use it here and below

https://codereview.appspot.com/12639043/diff/8001/src/cmd/api/run.go#newcode92
src/cmd/api/run.go:92: // If this exists immediately, we're done.
s/immediately/already/ ?

https://codereview.appspot.com/12639043/diff/8001/src/cmd/api/run.go#newcode105
src/cmd/api/run.go:105: "go.tools.TMP")
use constant here

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=08ad5d12478d ***

cmd/api: update run.go to fetch from go.tools when needed
